abstract: Facebook shares have recently traded on the secondary market for around $76, giving the company an implied value of $33 billion.
snippet: Facebook shares have recently traded on the secondary market for around $76, giving the company an implied value of $33 billion.
lead_paragraph: Mark Zuckerberg’s donation of $100 million to the troubled schools of Newark made waves last week, but now it’s time to look a gift horse in the mouth, The New York Times’s Andrew Ross Sorkin writes in his latest DealBook column.

headline.main: The Value of a Piece of Facebook
